belongs_to_collection.name: Icon Male's Don't Tell My Wife Series

overview: Colby Jansen marries his gorgeous high school sweetheart. They were both married previously, but unsuccessfully, and then Colby meets the woman of his dreams again at his high school reunion. The courtship is quick, and soon Colby is meeting his new stepson. It's a full house for sure. Do you think everybody will get along? Woof!
title: Don't Tell My Wife 2
